src:
Sabuni vädjar till Löfven om AF: ”Ett akut problem”
Situationen på Arbetsförmedlingen blir allt mer akut och nu anser Liberalernas partiledare Nyamko Sabuni att partierna bakom januariavtalet måste agera. I ett brev vädjar hon direkt till statsminister Stefan Löfven.
05 Nov 2019, 19:36 by Fredrik Öjemar

text:
Sabuni appeals to Löfven about AF: "An acute problem"
The situation at the Employment Service is becoming more and more acute and now the Liberal Party leader Nyamko Sabuni believes that the parties behind the January agreement must act. In a letter she appeals directly to Prime Minister Stefan Löfven.
05 Nov 2019, 19:36 by Fredrik Öjemar
